revision.comment: Reverted edits by [[Special:Contribs/Hawkeye7|Hawkeye7]] ([[User talk:Hawkeye7|talk]]) to last version by Gerda Arendt
revision.text: {{talkheader}} {{ArticleHistory |action1=GAN |action1date=15:37, 27 March 2011 |action1link=Talk:William Brill/GA1 |action1result=listed |action1oldid=420944438 |maindate= 17 May 2016 |action2=WAR |action2date=02:58, 24 April 2011 (UTC) |action2link=Wikipedia:WikiProject Military history/Assessment/William Brill |action2result=approved |action2oldid=425599732 |action3=FAC |action3date=21:42, 30 May 2011 |action3link=Wikipedia:Featured article candidates/William Brill/archive1 |action3result=promoted |action3oldid=431355663 |dykdate=8 April 2011 |dykentry=... that during a [[Battle of Berlin (air)|raid on Berlin]] in 1944, [[Royal Australian Air Force|RAAF]] Squadron Leader '''[[William Brill|Bill Brill]]'''{{`s}} ''(pictured)'' [[Avro Lancaster]] was struck by [[Incendiary device|incendiary bomb]]s dropped by another Allied aircraft above him? |topic=war |currentstatus=FA |four=yes }} {{WikiProjectBannerShell|1= {{WikiProject Australia|class=FA|importance=Low|military=y|military-importance=Low}} {{WikiProject Aviation|class=FA|Biography=y}} {{WikiProject Biography|living=n|class=FA|listas=Brill, William|military-work-group=y|military-priority=low}} {{WikiProject Military History|class=FA|A-Class=pass|Aviation=y|Biography=y|ANZSP=y|WWII=y|Cold-War=y}} }} == External links modified == Hello fellow Wikipedians, I have just modified {{plural:1|one external link|1 external links}} on [[William Brill (RAAF officer)]]. Please take a moment to review [https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?diff=prev&oldid=712956045 my edit]. If you have any questions, or need the bot to ignore the links, or the page altogether, please visit [[User:Cyberpower678/FaQs#InternetArchiveBot|this simple FaQ]] for additional information. I made the following changes: *Corrected formatting/usage for http://www.actpla.act.gov.au/tools_resources/maps_land_survey/place_names/place_search?sq_content_src=%2BdXJsPWh0dHAlM0ElMkYlMkZ3d3cuYWN0bWFwaS5hY3QuZ292LmF1JTJGUGxhY2VOYW1lcyUyRlBsYWNlRGV0YWlscy5hc3B4JTNGb2JqZWN0SUQlM0Q2MjQ4JmFsbD0x When you have finished reviewing my changes, please set the ''checked'' parameter below to '''true''' or '''failed''' to let others know (documentation at {{tlx|Sourcecheck}}). {{sourcecheck|checked=false}} Cheers.—[[User:Cyberbot II|cyberbot II]][[User talk:Cyberbot II|Talk to my owner]]:Online 01:25, 1 April 2016 (UTC) == Problem with neutrality and notability == This is a well written article, but I wonder if this person is notable enough to deserve an article about. Being awarded the distinguished flying cross is indeed very honorable, as is serving as a bomber group commander in the war, but those accomplishments are not in themselves enough to deserve an encyclopedic entry. Many people were awarded the DFC, and many served as group leaders; it seems unbalanced for William Brill to deserve a special article. Furthermore, I wonder if a similar pilot and officer from, say, the Chinese people's liberation army Air Force, would be found deserving of an equal article. — Preceding [[Wikipedia:Signatures|unsigned]] comment added by [[User:Kot8|Kot8]] ([[User talk:Kot8|talk]] • [[Special:Contributions/Kot8|contribs]]) 07:42, 17 May 2016 (UTC) :This is far from the only Wikipedia article on an Australian aviator and awarded veteran. [[User:Brutannica|Brutannica]] ([[User talk:Brutannica|talk]]) 14:29, 17 May 2016 (UTC) :: Kot8 - notability isn't about whether someone is "deserving" or not (something which is obviously subjective at any rate), it rests on whether they have received significant coverage in reliable sources independent of the subject per [[WP:GNG]]. Clearly Brill HAS received a large amount of coverage and therefore meets the requirement. If "similar pilots and officers" from the Chinese air force have also been written about as extensively as Brill and you are willing to donate your time to write articles on them then I encourage you to do so. [[User:Anotherclown|Anotherclown]] ([[User talk:Anotherclown|talk]]) 00:25, 18 May 2016 (UTC)
